Data.description: Text data that will be converted to QRCode

CorrectLevel.description:
QRCode's correction level (H, M, L)
Default to High correction level (H)
@menu
- [H]:(High) = high correction level
- [M]:(Medium) = medium correction level
- [L]:(Low) = low correction level

ToElement.description: This node can be used to convert SVGText into HTML Element

DivElement.description: SVG Element inside of a div container
